subtitleNullable: The comprehensive collection of parsed data from the SheIn - - ecommerce dataset
descriptionNullable:
# [SheIn Fashion](https://shein.com) 109,00 Products Dataset

Using web scraping, we collected information on over **109,000** clothing items from the SheIn website. 
The dataset can be applied in E-commerce analytics in the fashion industry. The similar dataset is [Asos E-Commerce Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/trainingdatapro/asos-e-commerce-dataset-30845-products).

# 💴 For Commercial Usage: To discuss your requirements, learn about the price and buy the dataset, leave a request on **[TrainingData](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/marketplace-scraping-data?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=shein-e-commerce-dataset)** to buy the dataset

# Dataset Info
For each item, we extracted:

- **url** - link to the item on the website
- **name** - item name
- **date** - date of web scraping; for all items - March 11, 2023
- **SKU** - unique identifier of the item
- **price** - item price
- **size** - sizes available on the website
- **brand** - item brand
- **description** - additional description, including available colors, composition, and care instructions, in JSON format
- **images** - photographs from the item description

# 💴 Buy the Dataset: Leave a request on **[https://trainingdata.pro/datasets](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/marketplace-scraping-data?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=shein-e-commerce-dataset)** to discuss your requirements, learn about the price and buy the dataset

**[TrainingData](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/marketplace-scraping-data?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=shein-e-commerce-dataset)** provides high-quality data annotation tailored to your needs.

*keywords: web scraping dataset, dataset marketplace, web scraping data, e-commerce dataset, e-commerce marketplace, e-commerce marketplace scraping dataset, e-commerce sales dataset, ecommerce clothing site, e-commerce text dataset, e-commerce product dataset, shein scraping dataset, shein dataset*
